Help.#cdata:
Suspends execution of the current SAS session until one of the specified tasks 
finishes executing. The default setting is _ANY_, which means that as soon as 
one of the specified task(s) completes executing, the WAITFOR statement will 
finish executing.

Suspends execution of the current SAS session until all of the specified tasks 
finishes executing.

[Syntax: TIMEOUT=seconds] 
    
Specifies the maximum number of seconds that WAITFOR should suspend the current 
SAS session. If you do not specify the TIMEOUT option, WAITFOR will suspend 
execution of the SAS session indefinitely.
